title: Filter pipeline view by owner, value, and date range
description: As a sales manager, I want to filter the pipeline view by deal owner, deal value, and date ranges, so that I can focus on specific segments of the pipeline for analysis and coaching.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I am viewing the pipeline, when I access the filter panel, then I see filter options for owner, deal value range, and created/close date
Given I select multiple filters, when I apply them, then only deals matching all criteria are displayed
Given I have active filters, when I view the pipeline, then I see a clear indication of active filters with the ability to clear them
Given I apply filters, when I refresh the page, then my filter selections are preserved

definitionOfDone.item: Filter state persistence (URL params or local storage)
